gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 121, Spurs 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Spurs, 121-112. Coby White recorded 24 points, six assists, and 4 rebounds for the Bulls, with Nikola Vucevic adding 21 points and 16 rebounds in the victory. Victor Wembanyama tallied 21 points, 20 rebounds, 4 assists, and 4 blocks for the Spurs in the defeat. The Bulls improve to 9-14 in the regular season, while the Spurs fall to 3-18.
